hort: Objective To optimize the extraction processes for ferulic acid from Ligusticum chuanxiong Hort.
目的研究川芎中阿魏酸提取的最佳工艺条件.
Two days are too hort for this job.
要两天完成工作,太局促了.
Objective A method was established for the determination of ferulic acid in the Ligusticum chuanxiong Hort.
目的建立川芎油中阿魏酸的含量测定方法.
